title: Every time a new champion out I play the "where is the %health damage?" minigame.
body:
And when I find it I go "AHA, there's the %health damage!"

The new champion played a trick, because I was sure it was going to be the health steal. Nope, you just went bland and made it the triple proc again.

replies.body: Riot basically deleted late game in 9/10 matches so it's nice to have some form of late game potential put back into the game through the plethora of % HP dmg based Champs.

What Rito thinks is late game potential and what we think are 2 vastly different things.

We don't want the game ending within 2 minutes of one particular player acquiring all their items, at the same time if they don't offer a late game let's end it now solution than games will never end.

I suppose it is up to the players stopping those late game hyper carries and allowing your team to get in that position first, team balance is still number 1. You get the right late and early game champs and control the game from start to finish.
